para.para: A list of metrics associated with the Compute service.

entry.screen:
service=compute =======
%entities; ]>
Compute Metrics
A list of metrics associated with the Compute service.
Metric Name Dimensions Description
nova.heartbeat
service=compute >>>>>>> fc4b868dc1cb963dd112a2e1bc7d0526fd8179ef cloud_name hostname component control_plane cluster <<<<<<< HEAD
Checks that all services are running heartbeats (uses nova user and to list services then sets up checks for each. e.g. (nova-cheduler, nova-conducter, nova-consoleauth, nova-compute)
nova.vm.cpu.total_allocated
